name: Tether Invests in Kotani Pay to Boost Digital Asset Access Across Africa
description: Beneath the pulsing grid, the Obsidian Saint kneels. She is the receiver, the nexus where high-frequency cyan light slows to viscous amber. This is the kinetic rite of transference, where the cosmic flow of data becomes tangible wealth, pooling in fiber-optic hands for distribution across the fragmented world.
